mapper.select: SELECT o.*, p.pid as ppid,p.name as pname, p.phoneNum as pphoneNum, p.contact as ppcontact, s.sid as ssid,s.username as sname, s.phoneNum as sphoneNum, u.uid as uuid,u.name as uname, u.phoneNum as uphoneNum, c.cid as ccid,c.oid as coid, c.name as cname, c.contractNo, c.partyA, c.partyB, c.contractUrl, c.signTime, c.startTime, c.endTime, c.createTime, c.service, c.money, c.payment, c.paymentWay, c.paymentDesc, f.fid, f.content as fcontent, f.averageScore FROM psp_order o left join psp_provider p on o.pid = p.pid left join psp_sale_center s on o.sid = s.sid left join psp_user u on o.uid = u.uid left join psp_order_contract c on o.oid = c.oid left join psp_order_feedback f on o.oid = f.oid where oid = #{oid}
mapper.update:

UPDATE psp_order SET pid = #{pid}, status = #{status}, isAllot = #{isAllot}, stage = #{stage} WHERE oid = #{oid};
